description: The Dutch government says it wants justice for all 298 victims aboard the plane shot down in 2014.
title: MH17 disaster: Dutch take Russia to European rights court
title_page: MH17 disaster: Dutch take Russia to European rights court - BBC News
maintext: In March, a trial opened in the Netherlands of three Russian and one Ukrainian citizens - still at large - for the murder of 298 people on board the plane. They are all linked to the pro-Moscow separatists.
